h1: How Many Calories in a Piece of Pepperoni Pizza?
assumptions: One slice (1/8 of a 14-inch pizza) with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, on regular crust; baked.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, toppings amount, crust type, and baking method. Check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical slice of pepperoni pizza contains about 285 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a piece of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: About 285 calories for one standard slice.

faqs.q: What's the protein in pepperoni pizza per slice?
faqs.a: Around 12 g of protein per piece.

faqs.q: Does crust type affect calories in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Yes—thin crust reduces by ~50 kcal; deep dish adds ~100 kcal per slice.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Typically 700 mg, mostly from cheese and pepperoni.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie tweaks for pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Opt for thin crust or veggie toppings to cut 40–50 kcal per piece.
